DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study bowel cleanse evaluation mix two type bowel preparation drug ( PICOLIGHT plus COOLPREP , PICOLIGHT plus CLICOLON ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation PICOLIGHT Plus COOLPREP , PICOLIGHT Plus CLICOLON Bowel Preparation
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate mixed-drug bowel preparation method decrease side effect increase compliance Picolight + Coolprep [ Day-Prior ] Picolight + Clicolon [ Day-Prior ] Picolight + Coolprep [ Split-Dose ] Picolight + Clicolon [ Split-Dose ]
DOC.criteria: 2065 year age Elective colonoscopy outpatient ( consent study ) Active enteritis , enteric bleeding , obstruction Pregnant lactate woman Severe liver renal insufficiency Allergic preparation component History heart disease ( ischemic heart disease , congestive heart failure , arrythmia ) History colorectal surgery History abdominal surgery within 6 month Toxic colitis megacolon Nausea vomit Status emergent abdominal surgery ( ex . acute appendicitis ) Uncontrolled clinically significant preexist electrolyte disturbance Dehydration Phenylketonuria Glucose6phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency Ileus Suspicious hyperphosphatemia Acute phosphate nephropathy
